name: NewsBlur - Dark Theme by Splike
description:
This is a continuation of Kemwer's discontinued "NewsBlur - Kemwer Black" theme from 2013.

Tested on the following browsers:
▸  Chrome
▸  FireFox
▸  Vivaldi

Compatible with:
▸  newsblur.com
▸  blog.newsblur.com
▸  forum.newsblur.com

If you have any requests or comments, be kind and let me know!
additional_info:
2020-06-14
  • ▸  Added support for the muted sites shown in the "All" view.
2019-04-08
  • ▸  Removed opaque white background overlay, during pop-up windows such as "Preferences", "Intelligence Trainer", etc.
  • ▸  Gave the same pop-up windows a new border, matching other windows like them.
  • ▸  Reverted "Add new site" pop-up window to behave like default NewsBlur. It was too easy to close the window, due to the dynamic resizing.
2019-01-22
  • ▸  Fixed color of the splash page.
2018-07-03
  • ▸  Themed the "Update" box on splash pane for free users.
  • ▸  Fixed some quotes not being themed in articles.
2018-06-27
  • ▸  Fixed forum.newsblur.com for FireFox.
2018-06-09
  • ▸  Added support for forum.newsblur.com.
2017-07-18
  • ▸  Made some visual changes to the automatic suggestions, when adding a new site.
  • ▸  Themed another kind of text box found in some stories.
  • ▸  Colored the arrow box, that you click to show more options for a feed or story.
  • ▸  Removed border from the Email, Train, Save and Share buttons.
  • ▸  Cleaned up borders of pop-up menus.
2017-06-15
  • ▸  Themed all pop-up windows under "Manage NewsBlur".
  • ▸  Fixed background color of feed fetching error messages.
2017-05-22
  • ▸  Re-themed the scrollbars to be more in line with the default NewsBlur theme.
  • ▸  Themed the search header, which is shown when searching inside a feed.
2017-03-29
  • ▸  Fixed background color of newsletters.
2017-02-24
  • ▸  Removed italicization of quotes.
  • ▸  Fixed colors for the folder folder titles shown, when moving a feed to another folder.
2017-01-31
  • ▸  Fixed colors for quotes.
2017-01-13
  • ▸  Fixed colors for the new "Dashboard River".
2016-10-08
  • ▸  Updated colors for tagging a saved story.
  • ▸  Updated colors for commenting a shared story.
2016-09-22
  • ▸  Finally added support for Grid-view.
2016-06-07
  • ▸  Fixed colors for "Interactions/activities" pop-out menu.
2016-05-02
  • ▸  Fixed colors for "Add a new site" auto suggestions.
2016-05-01
  • ▸  Fixed colors of story changes/strikethrough text.
  • ▸  Added dark theme to "Add a new site" menu.
  • ▸  Added dark theme to "Style" menu.
  • ▸  Added dark theme to "Unread/Oldest" menu.
  • ▸  Added dark theme to "Interactions/Activities" menu.
2016-03-20
  • ▸  Added support for blog.newsblur.com.
  • ▸  Fixed feed titles for "Global Shared Stories", "All Site Stories", "Read Stories" and "Saved Stories".
2016-03-03
  • ▸  Fixed "Manage NewsBlur" menu.
2016-03-01
  • ▸  Added dark theme to story comments.
2016-02-28
  • ▸  Official release.
